lost-internet-connection: You have lost connection to the internet. The application works in a limited mode.

no-list-selected.title: No list selected
no-list-selected.description: Select or create a new shopping list.

empty-list.title: Empty list
empty-list.description: You can add items that you want to purchase to your shopping list. Plus, you can share your lists with other users.

confirm-exit.title: Confirm exit
confirm-exit.description: Are you sure you want to exit?

sign-in-to-use: Sign in to use the application
choose-auth-method: Choose an authorization method in the application
